articles.title: Kanye West banned from performing at Grammys - Good Morning America
articles.description: The artist, who is now legally known as Ye, was barred from performing at next month’s event due to “concerning online behavior.”

articles.title: Porsche Club Of America Restores A 1998 911 (996) Into A Classic Beauty - AutoJosh
articles.description: Porsche Club of America (PCA) and Porsche Classic teamed up to turn a neglected 1998 996 911 into a gorgeous one-of-a-kind build. The resulting 996 911 features a period-correct 911 GT3 drivetrain and a host of other unique touches to create this stunning sho…

articles.title: Injured Fritz ends Nadal win streak to lift Indian Wells title - Rappler
articles.description: American Taylor Fritz denies Australian Open champion Rafael Nadal what would have been his fourth title of the season
articles.content: Taylor Fritz battled through excruciating pain to bring Rafa Nadal’s 20-match winning run to an end with a 6-3, 7-6 (5), victory in the Indian Wells final on Sunday, March 20, becoming the first Amer… [+2666 chars]

articles.author: Adam Bankhurst
articles.title: The Batman Wins the Domestic Weekend Box Office Again and Crosses $300 Million in North America - IGN - IGN
articles.description: Not only has The Batman won the domestic weekend box office for the third week in a row, but it has also become only the second film in the pandemic era to cross $300 million in North America.
articles.content:
